description: From the trade name Popsicle, a blend of (soda) pop or lollipop +‎ Epsicle (original trade name), itself a blend of Epperson (surname of the inventor) +‎ icicle.

entries.meaning: (chiefly US, Canada) Frozen fruit juice, flavored sugar water, or the like, on a stick, of a size to be one serving.

examples: Turn up the thermostat! We're all turning into popsicles in here!
